activities: ClickFox's software analyzes the interactions between a company and its customers across all platforms, voice, ivr, email website in order to understand a customer's relationship with the company and to provide customer relationship data in order for a company to provide better service to its customers.
personaldata: organization, customer, client, visitor, includes manually processed data
recoursemech: ClickFox will investigate the matter and attempt to resolve all issues to the satisfaction of the individual raising the question or concern.  If the matter cannot be settled at that stage, ClickFox agrees to cooperate with competent EU Data Protection Authorities.
